form.PN:
besedo ponavadi izgovarjamo
/D@n/
, kadar jo poudarimo, pa
/D*&ae;n/
.

sense.def:
Z besedo
than
povezujemo dva dela primerjave.

seg.quote: You've got more money than me.
We talked for more than an hour.
She was fatter than when he last saw her.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
than
povezujemo tudi dva dela nasprotja.

seg.quote: He chose the stairs rather than the lift.
I would sooner read than watch television.
